With respect to Delhiâ€™s efforts to tackle its air pollution, its government has been resorting to the use of odd-even rationing. Consider the following statements about this concept:
  1. It restricts access by certain parts of the population to resources on certain days.
  2. The measure is to serve as a long term solution to air pollution problem.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Statement 1 is correct: Odd-even rationing is the method of restricting access to resources by certain parts of the population on certain days. Delhi is to use the method to regulate the use of road facilities by private vehicles. This is to curb air pollution in the city. Statement 2 is incorrect: The method had been previously used in 2016. The impact of this measure was studied and it showed compliance issue to be an impediment to its success. The experts recommend its use as a short term/ emergency measure. The experts recommend the use of this measure to curb pollution especially during winter. The 2016 project is reported to have reduced pollution by 14 to 16%.
